bronze:DazingPulse.NAME: Dazing Pulse
bronze:DazingPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert !M! *Dazed.

bronze:Spike.NAME: Spike
bronze:Spike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Thorns.

bronze:Explode.NAME: Explode
bronze:Explode.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Insert a *Burn. NL bronze:Compile - ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

bronze:DonuBeam.NAME: Donu Beam
bronze:DonuBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.

bronze:DecaBeam.NAME: Deca Shield
bronze:DecaBeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Plated Armor and bronze:Insert !bauto! *Dazed.

bronze:Goto.NAME: Goto
bronze:Goto.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL bronze:Compile - Draw !M! card.
bronze:Goto.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL bronze:Compile - Draw !M! cards.

bronze:Branch.NAME: Branch
bronze:Branch.DESCRIPTION: Choose - Deal !D! damage or gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Encode the option not chosen. NL Exhaust.

bronze:DelayedSlice.NAME: Delayed Slice
bronze:DelayedSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

bronze:Terminator.NAME: Terminator
bronze:Terminator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - If this is the last card in the Sequence, double its damage.

bronze:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
bronze:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert a *Burn+.

bronze:CutThrough.NAME: Cut Through
bronze:CutThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Compile - Draw !bauto! card.

bronze:RecursiveStrike.NAME: Recursive Strike
bronze:RecursiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !bauto! times. π NL At the start of your turn, if this is in the Sequence, increase its damage by !M!.

bronze:DarkDash.NAME: Dark Dash
bronze:DarkDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert a *Void.

bronze:OilSpill.NAME: Oil Spill
bronze:OilSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert a *Slimed.

bronze:WildBeam.NAME: Wild Beam
bronze:WildBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert a *Wound.

bronze:Frontload.NAME: Frontload
bronze:Frontload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Retain.

bronze:Shell.NAME: Shell
bronze:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! bronze:Blur. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! bronze:Blur.

bronze:BitShift.NAME: Bit Shift
bronze:BitShift.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in the Sequence to return to your hand. NL It gains Retain. NL Exhaust.
bronze:BitShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in the Sequence to return to your hand. NL It gains Retain.

bronze:Batch.NAME: Batch
bronze:Batch.DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards in the Sequence. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Batch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards in the Sequence.

bronze:Constructor.NAME: Constructor
bronze:Constructor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - If this is the first card in the Sequence, double its Block.

bronze:Separator.NAME: Separator
bronze:Separator.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - If this is not the first or last card in the Sequence, gain NL !M! [E] .

bronze:Overload.NAME: Overload
bronze:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each card in the Sequence. They do not Encode. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of each card in the Sequence. They do not Encode.

bronze:GetLatest.NAME: Get Latest
bronze:GetLatest.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card with bronze:Encode to your hand. NL It costs 0. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Artifact.

bronze:DigitalCarnage.NAME: Digital Carnage
bronze:DigitalCarnage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Function costs [E] more and gains Ethereal.

bronze:NullPointer.NAME: Null Pointer
bronze:NullPointer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Unplayable.

bronze:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
bronze:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Dexterity.

bronze:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
bronze:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Encode a random card with bronze:Encode in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

bronze:SearingBeam.NAME: Searing Beam
bronze:SearingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. π NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

bronze:Backtrace.NAME: Backtrace
bronze:Backtrace.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL   Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Exhaust.

bronze:CloningBeam.NAME: Merge Conflict
bronze:CloningBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it. NL Exhaust.
bronze:CloningBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it.

bronze:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
bronze:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If the last played card was a Function, play this again.

bronze:ChosenStrike.NAME: Cultist Strike
bronze:ChosenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Increase this card's damage by !M! permanently.

bronze:ClassDefault.NAME: Class Default
bronze:ClassDefault.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the first card in the current Sequence to the next !M! Sequences automatically.
bronze:ClassDefault.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a copy of the first card in the current Sequence to the next !M! Sequences automatically.

bronze:ItsAFeature.NAME: It's a Feature
bronze:ItsAFeature.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 Temporary Strength and Dexterity.
bronze:ItsAFeature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 Temporary Strength and Dexterity.

bronze:InfiniteBeams.NAME: Infinite Beams
bronze:InfiniteBeams.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Minor *Beam to your hand.
bronze:InfiniteBeams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Minor *Beam+ to your hand.

bronze:Optimize.NAME: Optimize
bronze:Optimize.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the next !M! cards you bronze:Encode that can be upgraded.

bronze:MaxOutput.NAME: Max Output
bronze:MaxOutput.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card and bronze:Insert 1 *Dazed.

bronze:Mutator.NAME: Mutator
bronze:Mutator.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Transform a Status in your hand into a copy of this.
bronze:Mutator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Transform a Status in your hand into a copy of this.

bronze:Allocate.NAME: Allocate
bronze:Allocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each Status in your draw pile.

bronze:Decompile.NAME: Decompile
bronze:Decompile.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in the Sequence. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Decompile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all cards in the Sequence. Gain [E] and draw a card for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

bronze:ChildClass.NAME: Child Class
bronze:ChildClass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL   bronze:Compile - Function gains 'Play this again'.

bronze:Repair.NAME: Repair
bronze:Repair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Heal !M! HP.

bronze:Boost.NAME: Boost
bronze:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
bronze:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Frail.

bronze:BronzeArmor.NAME: Bronze Armor
bronze:BronzeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !bauto! Artifact. NL bronze:Compile - ALL enemies gain !M! Artifact.

bronze:ForLoop.NAME: For Loop
bronze:ForLoop.DESCRIPTION: The next card you bronze:Encode causes X additional copies to also be bronze:Encoded. NL Exhaust.
bronze:ForLoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The next card you bronze:Encode causes X additional copies to also be bronze:Encoded. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Philosophize.NAME: Philosophize
bronze:Philosophize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !bauto! Strength. NL bronze:Compile - ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

bronze:Return.NAME: Return
bronze:Return.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and draw 1 additional card at the start of your next X turns. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
bronze:Return.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and draw 1 additional card at the start of your next X turns. NL Gain [E] .

bronze:ForceShield.NAME: Force Shield
bronze:ForceShield.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Function created this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

bronze:Format.NAME: Format
bronze:Format.DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of *Fragment to the Sequence. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
bronze:Format.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 copies of *Fragment to the Sequence. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

bronze:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
bronze:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for ALL of your Status cards, then Exhaust them. NL bronze:Insert 3 *Burns.

bronze:ShipIt.NAME: Ship It
bronze:ShipIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL of your Status cards.

bronze:Break.NAME: Break
bronze:Break.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - bronze:Insert !M! random Status cards.

bronze:InfiniteLoop.NAME: Infinite Loop
bronze:InfiniteLoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add a copy of this into your hand and increase its damage by !M!.
bronze:InfiniteLoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add a copy of this into your hand and increase its damage by !M!.

bronze:Library.NAME: Library
bronze:Library.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random card with bronze:Encode to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

bronze:Verify.NAME: Sentient Form
bronze:Verify.DESCRIPTION: After you play a Function, increase all numbers on it by 1.
bronze:Verify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL After you play a Function, increase all numbers on it by 1.

bronze:BronzeHeatsink.NAME: Bronze Heatsink
bronze:BronzeHeatsink.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Function, draw a card.
bronze:BronzeHeatsink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Function, draw 2 cards.

bronze:CopyPaste.NAME: Copy Paste
bronze:CopyPaste.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Function is played twice.
bronze:CopyPaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, your next Function is played twice.

bronze:LegacyCode.NAME: Legacy Code
bronze:LegacyCode.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand.
bronze:LegacyCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

bronze:Repulsor.NAME: Repulsor
bronze:Repulsor.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the first Status or Curse card you draw each turn.
bronze:Repulsor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhaust the first Status or Curse card you draw each turn.

bronze:Debug.NAME: Debug
bronze:Debug.DESCRIPTION: Remove all negative bronze:Compile effects from the cards in the Sequence. NL Exhaust.

bronze:HyperBeam.NAME: HYPER BEAM
bronze:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Skip your next turn. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

bronze:Hardcode.NAME: Hardcode
bronze:Hardcode.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL The next Function you bronze:Compile goes into your deck permanently instead of your hand.

bronze:SpaghettiCode.NAME: Spaghetti Code
bronze:SpaghettiCode.DESCRIPTION: Until the Sequence is full, choose 1 of 2 random cards to bronze:Encode. NL Exhaust.
bronze:SpaghettiCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Until the Sequence is full, choose 1 of 2 random cards to bronze:Encode.

bronze:Assembly.NAME: Assembly
bronze:Assembly.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Choose any of them with bronze:Encode and add them to the Sequence in the order they were selected.

bronze:FineTuning.NAME: Fine Tuning
bronze:FineTuning.DESCRIPTION: Increase all numbers on cards in the Sequence by !M!. NL Exhaust.
bronze:FineTuning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase all numbers on cards in the Sequence by !M!.

bronze:CleanCode.NAME: Clean Code
bronze:CleanCode.DESCRIPTION: Remove all negative bronze:Compile effects from the next !M! Functions you bronze:Compile.

bronze:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into the Void
bronze:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Daze.NAME: Daze
bronze:Daze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

bronze:TinkerersToolbox.NAME: Tinkerer's Toolbox
bronze:TinkerersToolbox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose between *Debug, *Batch and *Decompile. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Refactor.NAME: Refactor
bronze:Refactor.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain !B! Block for each Status card discarded.

bronze:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
bronze:Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL bronze:Insert a *Void.

bronze:BugBarrage.NAME: Bug Barrage
bronze:BugBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Wound to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each Status card in hand.
bronze:BugBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Wounds to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each Status card in hand.

bronze:FindAndReplace.NAME: Find and Replace
bronze:FindAndReplace.DESCRIPTION: Draw a Function. It costs 1 less this turn. NL Add a *Dazed into your draw pile.
bronze:FindAndReplace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw a Function. It costs 1 less this turn. NL Add a *Dazed into your draw pile.
